programme.title: Machine Gun Preacher
programme.desc: Sam Childers (Gerard Butler), a former biker, travels to Africa to establish an orphanage for young victims of war.

programme.title: Chaos
programme.desc: A veteran detective and a rookie cop have to stop a master thief's computer virus before it drains all the funds from a bank's accounts.

programme.title: Green Street Hooligans: Underground
programme.desc: After his brother dies in an organized fight, a one-time hooligan who has become a martial artist returns to avenge the young man.

programme.title: Catch .44
programme.desc: The plan of three women (Malin Akerman, Nikki Reed, Deborah Ann Woll) to intercept a drug shipment for their boss (Bruce Willis) goes horribly wrong.

programme.title: Tank Girl
programme.desc: A renegade (Lori Petty) challenges the controller (Malcolm McDowell) of the world's water supply on a post-apocalyptic desert Earth.

programme.title: Rebel Without a Crew: The Robert Rodriguez Film School
programme.desc: Robert breaks down how he approaches low-budget screenwriting and teaches the audience how to start their own screenplays by using his notecard method.

programme.title: Matador
programme.desc: Tony and Annie go on a manhunt; Galan becomes aware of the larger plan; Samuel digs into Tony's back story.

programme.title: Matador
programme.desc: Samuel's digging puts Tony and Galan at odds; the CIA learns of Dr. Lucien Sayer's secret.

programme.title: Paranoia
programme.desc: With his job at stake, a tech-savvy employee (Liam Hemsworth) has to infiltrate a competitor's company and steal trade secrets for his ruthless boss (Gary Oldman).

programme.title: Haywire
programme.desc: After a successful mission to free a Chinese hostage, a highly trained operative (Gina Carano) is betrayed and left for dead by someone in her own agency.

programme.title: Redemption
programme.desc: Joey, an alcoholic war veteran assumes a new identity after returning from a traumatic tour in Afghanistan and becomes a vigilante in a bid to atone for his sins.

programme.title: Chaos
programme.desc: A veteran detective and a rookie cop have to stop a master thief's computer virus before it drains all the funds from a bank's accounts.

programme.title: Machete Kills
programme.desc: The president recruits ex-Federale Machete (Danny Trejo) to take down an eccentric arms dealer who plans to spread war and anarchy throughout the world.

programme.title: Donnie Darko: The Director's Cut
programme.desc: An unusual teenager (Jake Gyllenhaal) follows the instructions of the 6-foot-tall rabbit which saved his life.

programme.title: Righteous Kill
programme.desc: Two veteran detectives hunt a vigilante whose crimes resemble those of a killer they put behind bars long ago.
